document_data.name: Grayflow River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grayflow''' was a river found in the western end of the [[Savage Frontier]] in [[northwest Faerûn]].
document_data.Geography:
Emerging from the [[Graypeak Mountains]], it ran northward toward [[Llorkh]], before veering west. It was joined by the river [[Loagrann]] south of [[Orlbar]],

Together, the Grayflow and the Loagrann drained the lands of the [[Greyvale]].
